title: Court of Appeal for Ontario
data: Superior Court of Justice ( 1991 to 2013 ) Pardu Macdonald ( 1976 to 1991 )
Superior Court of Justice ( 2002 to 2005 ) Heenan Blaikie
section_text: A courtroom at Osgoode Hall . Over the dais are the Royal Arms of the United Kingdom , which until 1931 were the Royal Arms for general purposes throughout the British Empire . The Statute of Westminster 1931 effectively elevated the Royal Arms of Canada to the position of the Queen 's Royal Arms for general purposes across Canada , which is why the Royal Arms of Canada are now used by the court to represent the Canadian Crown Position Name Appointed Nominated by Position ( s ) Prior to Appointment* Chief Justice George Strathy 13 June 201426 April 2013 Harper Ontario Court of Appeal Superior Court of Justice ( 2007 to 2013 ) Associate Chief Justice Alexandra Hoy 7 June 2013 2 December 2011 Harper Ontario Court of Appeal Superior Court of Justice Justice Mary Lou Benotto 8 November 2013 Harper Superior Court of Justice ( 1996 to 2013 ) Family Court ( 2001 to 2005 ) Chapell Bushell Stewart ( 1978 to 2001 ) Justice David M Brown 16 December 2014 Harper Superior Court of Justice ( 2006 to 2014 ) Justice David H.
